post.body: My clan (the Campbells) have a similar saying: Never Forget. It's morphed over the years into "Never Forgive, Never Forget."
- Pashminas: http://tinyurl.com/4p539h
- We used to build some seriously AMAZING forts out of boxes and blankets after Christmas. Boxes rock!
- Amazon :) Free shipping to boot! I can send you the link if you like? 3 days left for shipping!
and @bradandersohn - It just means he'd need a REALLY big box! ;) ;)
- found cashmere scarf for sis, two silk pashminas for mom and bro's GF. Retail @ $125-150...I got them for <$25. So pleased.
- How do you wrap a firetruck? IN A BOX!
So noted. Stupid Seattlites.
Read my blog. It's AWFUL. Stupid Seattlites who can't FREAKING drive.
Ugh! Sorry to hear about the teeth. I'm 25 and I've had two root canals; I'm probably due for a third :(
LAME! Grrrrrrr....
Don't forget! You were just here and I got no business card! SHAME.
Are they beautimous?
LAME. 80s. Grrr. @lisaheindel That sounds odd, but yummy..I think.
What do you use marinated cheese for? Srsly, you need to come to my house and make Xmas dinner... I have no one to cook for!
Lol, you're welcome - all I did was ask your commission;) It's like...what, $200K? I'm so jealous. Clearly, I'm in the wrong job.
People are sliding down my hill again...I'm getting used to the sound of squeeling tires.
Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names. - John F. Kennedy
Also, @elainehanson - I find TONS of great stuff here: http://www.undrgrnd.com/
I made it to work; don't know how long I'll say...405 is a mess! Seattle is a mess! The bridges weren't so bad, though...just unsalted.
Just posted on ActiveRain: Things I Learned in New England that have Saved my Life (and my Mood) in the Snow http://activerain.com/t/844456
Just witnessed an ambulence sliding into a curb, and a dude sliding into the ambulence. A second ambulence had to come pick up the injured.
Just posted on ActiveRain: Update on Open Letter to Seattle http://activerain.com/t/843301
Convo on the stairs: Him- still a disaster out there? Me- Yes but a drivable one, if you pick the right roads. Him- Ugh. I hate snow.
Just saved my car from the overpriced garage. Gave a bum couple some cookies. Parked in an overpriced lot.
This just in: Apparently, they are not letting people leave Mercer Island due to the snow. That means no one's going across I-90 today!
Haha, that wasn't actually my post... I was doing adminny-type stuff. My bad!
Just posted on ActiveRain: Gah! The Meme Monster Strikes Again! http://activerain.com/t/862281
Just posted on ActiveRain: Dear 2008, I will not miss you. http://activerain.com/t/859950
Eating leftover beans n' rice. Om nom nom.
Had a finances meeting, drank coffee, opened and responded to mail, suggested a site, picked up lunch, and now am doing tickets.
Fat and happy. Sis brought soup and smashed pertaters. I added pomegranates, rolls, pie & cider. Om nom nom.
Doing Xmas "feast" with my sis 2nite; started last year when Mom made plans w/o us on Xmas. Dinner, pie, and card games ;) It's ON, baby!
Just posted on ActiveRain: Merry Everything, Everyone! http://activerain.com/t/851918
Twas the night before Christmas...Merry Christmas to all and to all a goodnight!
Aw, crud. I woke up & looked out the window ... it's snowing again. Can I be done being snowed in yet? Jeez, Louise.
Also: Did my good deed for the day. Front-wheel drive BMU got stuck parked behind my car, so I helped push 'er out.
Had to system restore back to last Sunday. Boo hiss :P Stupid viruses.
Grr, fairly sure my computer just contracted a hijacker. Stupid IE7.
Abort! Abort! Yet another ambulance backing down the half-hill they just went up. You'd think they'd put an APB out on this hill already.
